data.title: About NBCUniversal Formats
data.meta_description: NBCUniversal International Formats is a key growth driver in NBCUniversal international expansion plans.
data.text:
NBCUniversal Formats, a division of the Universal Studio Group, is the international sales division for all formats created within the production, broadcast and streaming divisions of NBCUniversal and Sky Studios, as well as select third parties. The division fosters an array of strategic alliances, co-production and co-development partnerships to bring new and existing content to the global market.

The slate represents a vast and diverse range of non-scripted and scripted formats from Universal Television, International Studios, Universal Television Alternative Studio, Universal Content Productions as well as the Sky Studios affiliated production companies. Additionally, NBCU Formats drive international sales for the prolific NBCUniversal cable networks, NBC, Telemundo and US streaming service, Peacock.

NBCUniversal Formats represents a vast and diverse slate of non-scripted and scripted formats. Leading brands include global success series Top Chef, hit game show Hollywood Game Night, Emmy Award-winning comedy showcase Saturday Night Live, global franchise The Real Housewives, entertainment formats World of Dance, Titan Games and Songland, factual entertainment shows The Secret Life of the Zoo and Best Parent?, in addition to scripted formats Suits, House, The Sinner, The Good Place and Superstore.

NBCUniversal is one of the world's leading media and entertainment companies in the development, production, and marketing of entertainment, news, and information to a global audience.

NBCUniversal owns and operates a valuable portfolio of news and entertainment networks, a premier motion picture company, significant television production operations, a leading television stations group, and world-renowned theme parks.

NBCUniversal is owned by Comcast.
